text: I'm trying to create a module that will let me display a list of blog articles and specify the number of posts that I want to show and which tag I want to show posts from. I'm getting these errors and I'm not sure what they mean. My end goal is to get a blog list similar to the ones on this page: <https://activegrowth.com/productivity/>

Hey Christina, in your code on line 11 you dont need to wrap your `module.` variables in brackets. you can just have them as `blog_popular_posts('default', module.number_of_posts_to_show, module.which_tag)`
